Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is light-brown in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393545) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393545)
